text: Thomas Billington (born 15 December 2001) is an English professional wrestler. He currently wrestles for All Elite Wrestling (AEW) under the ring name Tommy Billington. Billington as also made appearances in Major League Wrestling (MLW). ==Professional wrestling career== ===All Elite Wrestling === On the May 11, 2024 episode of Collision in Vancouver, Billington made his debut for All Elite Wrestling in a loss to Dax Harwood. He went on to lose to Konosuke Takeshita on the 13 July episode of Collision and to Chris Jericho on the 21 August episode of Dynamite. At All In London: Zero Hour, Billington earned his first AEW victory teaming with Action Andretti, Kip Sabian, Kyle Fletcher, Lio Rush, Rocky Romero, and Top Flight (Dante Martin and Darius Martin) in a 16-man tag team match to defeat Anthony Ogogo, Ariya Daivari, Jay Lethal, Private Party (Isiah Kassidy & Marq Quen), Satnam Singh and The Dark Order (Alex Reynolds & John Silver). == Personal life == Billington's uncle was professional wrestler Dynamite Kid. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:All Elite Wrestling people Category:English professional wrestlers Category:People from Wigan Category:Sportspeople from Greater Manchester
title: Tommy Billington
